data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article James, Samuel W., Bartz, Marie L. C., Stanton, David W. G., Conrado, Ana C., Dupont, Lise, Taheri, Shabnam, Silva, Elodie Da, Cunha, Luís, Brown, George G. (2019): A neotype for Pontoscolex corethrurus (Müller, 1857) (Clitellata). Zootaxa 4545 (1): 124-132, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4545.1.7
